mapper.select:
/* 프로모션 번호와 회원번호로 다운로드 가능한 갯수와 기다운로드 갯수 조회 */
select cpn.dwl_psb_cnt, cpn.psn_dwl_psb_cnt, (select count(*) from cc_cpn_issue where prm_no = #{prmNo} and org_cpn_iss_no is null) as used_cnt, (select count(*) from cc_cpn_issue where prm_no = #{prmNo} and mbr_no = #{mbrNo} and org_cpn_iss_no is null) as psn_used_cnt from cc_prm_base prm inner join cc_cpn_base cpn using (prm_no) where prm.use_yn = 'Y' and case when cpn.dwl_priod_ccd = '10' then current_date between cpn.dwl_avl_strt_dd::date and cpn.dwl_avl_end_dd::date + interval '1 day' when cpn.dwl_priod_ccd = '20' then current_date between cpn.dwl_avl_strt_dd::date and cpn.dwl_avl_strt_dd::date + interval '1 day' * cpn.dwl_std_dd else false end and cpn.prm_no = #{prmNo}

select cpb.prm_no, cpb.prm_priod_ccd, cpb.prm_strt_dt, cpb.prm_end_dt, cpb.prm_std_dd, cci.mbr_no, cci.sys_reg_dtime, cci.cpn_use_dt from cc_prm_base cpb inner join cc_cpn_issue cci using (prm_no) where cci.cpn_iss_no = #{cpnIssNo}
